title: XDM Business Account Person Relation
description: XDM Business Account Person Relation is a standard Experience Data Model (XDM) class that captures the minimum required properties of a person that is associated with a business account. This XDM class can only be included in the profile for customers with the B2B or B2P Edition.

xdm:accountPersonID.title: Account Person ID
xdm:accountPersonID.description: Unique identifier for this relationship between an account and a person.

xdm:accountPersonKey.title: Account Person Key
xdm:accountPersonKey.description: Unique composite identifier for this relationship between an account and a person.

xdm:accountID.title: Account ID
xdm:accountID.description: Unique identifier for the account in this account person relationship.

xdm:accountKey.title: Account Key
xdm:accountKey.description: Unique composite identifier for the account in this account person relationship.

xdm:personID.title: Person ID
xdm:personID.description: Unique identifier for the person in this account person relationship.

xdm:personKey.title: Person Key
xdm:personKey.description: Unique composite identifier for the person in this account person relationship.

xdm:personRole.title: Person Role
xdm:personRole.description: Role of the person on this account.

xdm:personRoles.title: Person Roles
xdm:personRoles.description: An array of roles of the person on this account.

xdm:isDirect.title: Direct Flag
xdm:isDirect.description: Boolean to indicate if this is a direct relationship between the account and the person.

xdm:isActive.title: Active Flag
xdm:isActive.description: Boolean to indicate if this relationship between the account and the person is active.

xdm:isPrimary.title: Primary Flag
xdm:isPrimary.description: Boolean to indicate if the person is the primary contact on the account.

xdm:relationStartDate.title: Relationship Start Date
xdm:relationStartDate.description: The date when the relationship between the account and the person started.

xdm:relationEndDate.title: Relationship End Date
xdm:relationEndDate.description: The date when the relationship between the account and the person ended.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency Code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for the relationship between the account and the person.
